mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.phone AS "phone", a.name AS "name", a.number_plate AS "numberPlate", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM dic_client a
a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}
AND a.phone LIKE '%'||#{phone}||'%' '%'+#{phone}+'%' concat('%',#{phone},'%')
AND a.name LIKE '%'||#{name}||'%' '%'+#{name}+'%' concat('%',#{name},'%')
AND a.number_plate LIKE '%'||#{numberPlate}||'%' '%'+#{numberPlate}+'%' concat('%',#{numberPlate},'%')
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO dic_client( id, phone, name, number_plate, create_date, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{phone}, #{name}, #{numberPlate}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE dic_client SET phone = #{phone}, name = #{name}, number_plate = #{numberPlate}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
